summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a structure that is initialized with a D3D11_RECT structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Address of the D3D11_RECT structure that initializes the CD3D11_RECT structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a structure that is initialized with the dimensions of a rectangle.

param.name: Left
param.para: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

param.name: Top
param.para: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

param.name: Right
param.para: The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

param.name: Bottom
param.para: The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized structure.
